sentences.en: A karate expert battered a man to death.
sentences.cn: 一位空手道高手将一名男子毒打致死。

sentences.en: Alice's boyfriend knew a little karate.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯的男朋友懂一点儿空手道.

sentences.en: Anson has great interest in karate and is a black belt sportsman.
sentences.cn: 国安对空手道有浓厚兴趣,学武十多年,现已晋身为黑带.

sentences.en: Combat sports such as karate and judo carry with them the risk of injury.
sentences.cn: 像空手道和柔道之类的搏击运动有受伤的危险.

sentences.en: Contestants must wear a white karate gi without stripes or piping.
sentences.cn: 选手须穿著白色无条纹及无滚边之空手道服.

sentences.en: Generally you exhale on the effort, if, say, doing weights, karate or boxing, and inhale on the “return”.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，如果你在练哑铃、空手道或拳击，你呼出的是努力，吸入的是“回报”。

sentences.en: He holds a black belt in karate.
sentences.cn: 他是空手道黑带级选手。

sentences.en: He is a black belt in karate.
I confirm that I am physically fit for training in Kyokushin Karate.
sentences.cn: 本人确认本人身体健康,适合接受极真空手道训练.

sentences.en: I learned some karate for self - defense and I learned some shadow - boxing.
sentences.cn: 我学过一点空手道,用来防身的;另外还学过一点太极拳.

sentences.en: In fact, I made him sign up for karate lessons.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 我还要他报名参加空手道课程.

sentences.en: Karate is a martial art that incorporates kicking, striking, and punching techniques.
sentences.cn: 空手道这种功夫融入了踢, 打及拳击技术.

sentences.en: Kerala's martial art form , Kalari Payattu , is very similar to Karate.
sentences.cn: 喀拉拉邦的传统武术( KalariPayattu ),与空手道非常相似.

sentences.en: No, I had it when I walked out the door. Dad picked me up to drive me to karate.
sentences.cn: 不可能，我出门的时候还带着，爸爸开车接我去上空手道的课，然后我把书包放在车里。

sentences.en: Singleton was a fantasist who claimed to have a karate blackbelt.
sentences.cn: 辛格尔顿是个牛皮大王，他自称有一条空手道黑带。

sentences.en: The black belt is the highest level in karate.
sentences.cn: 黑腰带级是空手道的最高级别.

sentences.en: You might take a self - defense class, such as karate.
sentences.cn: 你可以参加一项 自我 保护的课程, 比如空手道.

trans.tran_cn: <日>空手道（日本的一种徒手自卫武术）
trans.tran_en: a Japanese fighting sport, in which you use your feet and hands to hit and kick
